DOC.detailed_description: Schizophrenia chronic disable illness typically begin late teen early adult years.1 This illness associate significant impairment area independent living , social functioning , vocational functioning.2 Indeed , 10 % people schizophrenia employ , translate annual lose wage nearly 15 billion dollars.3,4 Schizophrenia also represent important societal burden illness estimate cost 40 billion dollar year United States alone.5 Repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation ( rTMS ) novel treatment neuropsychiatric illness . A non-invasive intervention , rTMS utilizes application repetitively pulse magnetic field scalp induce electric field within discrete area cerebral cortex . This electric field result alter ion flow across neuronal cellular membrane ultimately change neuronal polarization . The end result alter neuronal activity area cerebral cortex rTMS applied.12 rTMS safe well-tolerated intervention receive FDA approval treatment refractory major depressive disorder 2008 since become commonly used clinical practice.13 This study propose examine application rTMS treatment cognitive dysfunction FEP . This important population study effective , rTMS may represent preventative treatment development social vocational impairment associate cognitive dysfunction schizophrenia . This study also seek refine understanding brain circuitry mediate potential pro-cognitive effect rTMS use functional magnetic resonance imaging ( fMRI ) baseline follow course rTMS administration .
DOC.criteria: 1840 year age study entry Male female DSM IVTR Diagnosis schizophrenia , schizophreniform disorder , schizoaffective disorder confirm Structured Clinical Interview DSMIVTR ( SCID ) 44 Subjects firstepisode psychosis , define onset clinically significant psychotic symptom within past five year determine first medical record documentation condition BACS composite tscore 40 less baseline assessment Clinical stability define : CGIS score less equal 4 ( moderately ill ) randomization AND Subjects must experience exacerbation illness within 4 week prior randomization , lead intensification psychiatric care opinion investigator . Examples intensification care include , limited : inpatient hospitalization , day/partial hospitalization , outpatient crisis management , psychiatric treatment emergency room AND Antipsychotic treatment stability least 4 week prior randomization ( change antipsychotic dose addition new antipsychotic medication ) . Able give inform consent Subjects must willing able adhere study schedule Outpatient Inpatient treatment status Female subject childbearing potential must test negative pregnancy screen baseline visit Lifetime history seizure , exclude febrile seizure induce substance withdrawal Metallic object plant near head , include implanted pacemaker , medication pump , vagal stimulator , deep brain stimulator , TENS unit , ventriculoperitoneal shunt , cochlear implant First degree relative ( , biological father , mother , brother , sister , child ) idiopathic epilepsy seizure disorder History significant neurological illness ( include stroke , CNS infection persistent neurologic deficit , event deem significant PI ) History head trauma define loss consciousness postconcussive syndrome deem significant PI Pregnancy breast feed Known IQ < 70 base medical history Current DSMIVTR diagnosis alcohol drug dependence ( exclude nicotine caffeine ) Subjects current acute , serious , unstable medical condition , include , limited : inadequately control diabetes , asthma , COPD , severe hypertriglyceridemia , recent cerebrovascular accident , acute systemic infection immunologic disease , unstable cardiovascular disorder , malnutrition , hepatic , renal gastroenterological , respiratory , endocrine , neurologic , hematologic , infectious disease base medical history physical examination .
